Workflow.Name: Admin | Email Managers Ignored Inactivity notifications Approvals
Workflow.Description: This flow works with the other Archive and Clean flows in that it looks for approvals from this system that have been ignored by makers for one month or more and sends their manager a list of these, asking they help by encouraging their employees to approve or reject the request.

LocalizedName.description: Admin | Email Managers Ignored Inactivity notifications Approvals

Description.description: This flow works with the other Archive and Clean flows in that it looks for approvals from this system that have been ignored by makers for one month or more and sends their manager a list of these, asking they help by encouraging their employees to approve or reject the request.
